title: Club Has Disappeared
body: So I just recently saw that Clubs were brought back online, only to find that the club(that I own) is now gone. I know for certain that I did not leave or disband my Club. Naturally, I go to create another one only to see that the name of it was taken, so it must still exist. Right? Anyone else have this issue? Any Rioters seeing this, are you aware of this issue? {{item:3070}}

replies.body: Just submitted a ticket, hopefully I can get back into mine too!
Solid plan, a ticket will help us investigate cases so we can find solutions!
It kinda seems that it's the club owners that are affected by this bug. They're still in their club but for some reason it doesn't show up for them when they log in.

Our clubs team has provided an [update](http://boards.na.leagueoflegends.com/en/c/miscellaneous/nMisJPK8-clubs-outage-oct-2016), currently reviewing cases where some owners can't see their clubs or clubs appearing as not having any owner.  

If you are experiencing issues with your club, hit us up in a [support ticket](https://support.riotgames.com/hc/en-us/requests/new) so we can look into these cases individually as well as submit it to our clubs team.  Thanks everyone who's submitted reports and helped out with this over the last few days!

Submitted a ticket,  any chance you could get me back in?  
[I'm the club owner, but my profile doesn't show that I'm a member of any club.  I can't interact with the club in any way from my account; chat, profile, the iphone app... My wife can see all the club options, with me still listed as the owner...  :(   also, my club tag is missing on the loadscreen.]

(the club name is 'Sheep For Wheat" with the tag "C4T4N".  If the fix involves booting me from the club; kindly promote Nim to owner.) 
Thanks!

To offer an update, it seems that we weren't able to recover 100% of past clubs and some players may need to recreate their clubs.  It's definitely a crappy case that sucks for those affected.  I don't have more information to share on this, but let me know if there are any issues or errors with re-creating a club and I'm happy to help!

My club as well. Its weird because my club is still existing on my friends accounts and such, even on my LOL chat app for mobile. But its only not available for me on the client. Im not able to recreate it either cause its still "existing/active". Mine is "The Disney Channel" with the tag being "FFpls"

Looking into this, I see that the club does exist and it still shows you as the owner.  Hit us up in a [support ticket](https://support.riotgames.com/hc/en-us/requests/new) so we can take a closer look and figure out what you aren't able to see it.  Hang tight!

P.S. I made one of your officers club leader and removed you, see if he can add you back now.

**UPDATE as of 11/2**

We're still looking into this issue and are working towards a solution. As it stands now, it's not necessary to submit any further tickets for this issue, as we're looking to roll out a solution that should solve this for most players. I cannot provide an ETA on when that fix will roll out, but we're working on it.

Thank you to everyone who has helped agregate information in this thread, it's really helped a lot!

____

If you'd like any further information on this issue, please visit [this post.](http://boards.na.leagueoflegends.com/en/c/miscellaneous/nMisJPK8-clubs-outage-oct-2016)
